1.0.0.name: wordpress/gstaticmap
1.0.0.description:
GStaticMap lets you embed Google static map in your blog pages using a predefined tag. The plugin conforms to Google Static Maps API V2. For more information about the API, please refer to Google Static Maps API documentation page.

Supported Parameters

Currently the GStaticMap plugin supports the following Google Static Map URL parameters:

  • key (absolutely :-d)
  • center
  • zoom
  • size
  • format
  • maptype
  • markers
  • path

More info:

  • GStaticMap Plugin.
  • Check out the other Wordpress plugins by the same author.
